attributes.action: impose taxation on Newspaper publishers and/or their distributors in order to reduce the number of unwanted CDs, DVDs, and other non biodegradable inclusions distributed within newspapers and similar publications.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every weekend newspapers are supplied with CDs or DVDs in order to attract additional sales. However, the vast majority of these media are unwanted and are simply disposed of in the domestic waste. This petition is to make newspaper publishers and distributors consider their actions, and if they continue to distribute such media in this irresponsible manner, to make them pay in full for suitable disposal or reprocessing.
